scripts.dev:watch: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "pnpm run build && pnpm run dev"
scripts.dev:watch:test: dotenv -e .env.test.local -- nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "pnpm run build && pnpm run dev"
scripts.test:watch: pnpm migrate:reset:test && dotenv -e .env.test.local -- nodemon --watch src --watch tests --ext ts --exec "mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.test.ts'"
scripts.migrate:dev:init: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.development.local -- prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.migrate:reset:dev: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.development.local -- prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.migrate:production:init: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.production.local -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:reset:production: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.production.local -- prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.migrate:test:init: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.test.local -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:reset:test: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.test.local -- prisma migrate reset --force
